featured.text: The theory underlying it is that lying is stressful, and that this stress can be measured and recorded on a polygraph machine.
The invention of the steam engine, which was used to power heavy machines, brought about a _____ change in society.
Which of the following statements is NOT true? (A) Robot Redford was a talking machine. (B) Robot Redford walked to the stage by itself.

definition.zh_def: 機器；一種用於執行特定任務的裝置或設備。
definition.en_def: A device that uses mechanical power to perform a specific task.
definition.example: The factory uses a machine to assemble the parts quickly.
